item.title: Refurbishing an old Twitter bot
item.description: Some time ago Numberphile released a series of videos concerning sequences in the OEIS with pretty plots. Inspired, I wrote a little Twitter bot that tweets out two such plots each day. I even got a follow from 3Blue1Brown. It was a wonderful source of dopamine for a while. Because I hacked the thing together in a dayYou can check out the source code, if you’re okay with your eyes melting out of your skull.
